body:
[Here's the most up-to-date spec for opt-out studies](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ZxZCMKl56LBkIvOHJ9pPDaDLtoRwtNLL1NALKPj5LTo/edit#).

I've filed a bunch of new issues under the `project: native-studies" tag, which constitute all the remaining work for implementing opt-out studies. Given that, I'm going to close this bug in favor of the tag for tracking development work.
body_text:

body_html:
Here's the most up-to-date spec for opt-out studies.

I've filed a bunch of new issues under the `project: native-studies" tag, which constitute all the remaining work for implementing opt-out studies. Given that, I'm going to close this bug in favor of the tag for tracking development work.
